meanings.definition: A plate or frame serving as a foundation for a machine or engine.
meanings.sent1: The bedplate of the engine kept it stable.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic inspected the bedplate of the machine for any cracks.
meanings.sent3: The bedplate decided to take a nap under the heavy engine.
meanings.sent4: The bedplate of the machine was the rock-solid base of its operation.
meanings.sent5: The bedplate, like a sturdy foundation, supported the entire weight of the engine.

meanings.definition: A plate or frame supporting the rails of a railroad track.
meanings.sent1: The workers replaced the old bedplate with a new one to ensure smooth train rides.
meanings.sent2: The bedplate along the tracks needed maintenance to prevent accidents.
meanings.sent3: The bedplate enjoyed being the backbone of the railway system.
meanings.sent4: The bedplate, like a guardian, protected the rails from shifting.
meanings.sent5: The bedplate, firmly in place, guided the train on its journey.
